# [Zoomable](https://zoomable.ca)

Zoomable Provider
Create Zoomable Image Instantly! Upload now or create
from your desktop.

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Zoomable
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: YES
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: *.zoomable.ca
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
